title: Ticket #4652: Using ec2_keypair for Opennebula
description:
When trying to use ec2_keypair with OpenNebula Cloud to use a pre-registered keypair results in following error in job log -

000 (1624.000.000) 10/10 21:52:18 Job submitted from host: <131.225.155.49:43794> ... 012 (1624.000.000) 10/10 21:52:21 Job was held. Can't use existing ssh keypair for server type OpenStack Code 0 Subcode 0 …

I will attach the JDF used.

Also, the submit attributes ec2_keypair and ec2_keypair_file are incorrectly documented in the manual as ec2_key_pair and ec2_key_pair_file in

http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.2/condor_submit.html#82250 http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.2/12_Appendix_A.html#91847 and probably more places.
remarks: Dup of #4649
creator: parag
